comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
Happens during debug.
Stop at a breakpoint inside JTable cell rendering code.
Have some expressions in Expressions
Get this NPE

!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.jdt.debug 4 120 2007-10-11 20:55:08.586

More information:

fixed in HEAD.

The NPE in question is the result of not being able to resolve the type bindings for a field access (the resolveBindings method is spec'd to return null but we don't check for it)
